en.title: Pre-University Program in Computer Science
en.description: Completed a preparatory program covering foundational computer science topics such as programming, algorithms, and data structures. Gained hands-on experience with problem-solving and logical thinking.

hu.title: Pre-University Program in Computer Science
hu.description: Completed a preparatory program covering foundational computer science topics such as programming, algorithms, and data structures. Gained hands-on experience with problem-solving and logical thinking.

en.title: Technical Course in Programming
en.description: Completed a technical course focusing on software development fundamentals, including object-oriented programming, web development, and database management. Developed several projects applying real-world coding skills.

hu.title: Technical Course in Programming
hu.description: Completed a technical course focusing on software development fundamentals, including object-oriented programming, web development, and database management. Developed several projects applying real-world coding skills.

en.title: Bachelor's in Graphic Design with UX Emphasis
en.description: Graduated with a solid foundation in graphic design while specializing in user experience design. Acquired expertise in visual storytelling, UI design, and collaborative design thinking.

hu.title: Bachelor's in Graphic Design with UX Emphasis
hu.description: Graduated with a solid foundation in graphic design while specializing in user experience design. Acquired expertise in visual storytelling, UI design, and collaborative design thinking.

en.title: Master's in Human-Computer Interaction
en.description: Completed an intensive program focusing on user-centered design principles, usability testing, and interaction design. Developed skills in wireframing, prototyping, and user research methodologies.

hu.title: Master's in Human-Computer Interaction
hu.description: Completed an intensive program focusing on user-centered design principles, usability testing, and interaction design. Developed skills in wireframing, prototyping, and user research methodologies.
